c:simple-property.name: jndi-name
c:simple-property.description: The JNDI Name under which the DataSource wrapper will be bound.

c:simple-property.name: driver-class
c:simple-property.description: The fully qualified name of the JDBC datasource class.

c:simple-property.name: connection-url
c:simple-property.description: The JDBC driver URL string.

c:simple-property.name: user-name
c:simple-property.description: The default username when creating a new connection.

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: The default password when creating a new connection.

c:simple-property.name: min-pool-size
c:simple-property.description: Indicates the minimum number of connections the pool should hold.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of 0 will be used.

c:simple-property.name: max-pool-size
c:simple-property.description: Indicates the maximum number of connections the pool should hold.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of 20 will be used.

c:simple-property.name: transaction-isolation
c:simple-property.description: The Transaction Isolation level. The default setting is to use whichever isolation level is provided by default by the database.

c:simple-property.name: blocking-timeout-millis
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates the maximum time in milliseconds to block while waiting for a connection before throwing an exception. Note that this blocks only while waiting for a permit for a connection, and will never throw an exception if creating a new connection takes an inordinately long time. If nothing is specified the default of 30000 milliseconds is used.

c:simple-property.name: idle-timeout-minutes
c:simple-property.c:description: Maximum time in minutes a connection can be idle before it is closed.

c:simple-property.name: set-tx-query-timeout
c:simple-property.description: whether to set the query timeout based on the time remaining until transaction timeout, any configured query timeout will be used if there is no transaction. The default is false.

c:simple-property.name: query-timeout
c:simple-property.description: Any configured query timeout in seconds The default is no timeout

c:simple-property.name: prepared-statement-cache-size
c:simple-property.c:description: The number of prepared statements per connection.

c:simple-property.name: share-prepared-statements
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of false will be used.

c:simple-property.name: valid-connection-checker-class-name
c:simple-property.c:description: Java class used to validate if a connection is valid.

c:simple-property.name: stale-connection-checker-class-name
c:simple-property.description: Name of the class to use to check if a Connection has become stale

c:simple-property.name: use-java-context
c:simple-property.description: Indicates if the JNDI name should be prefixed with java:.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of true will be used.

c:simple-property.name: security-domain
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates Subjects from security domain are used to distinguish connections in this pool.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default will be to use a single pool of equivalent connections.

c:simple-property.name: new-connection-sql
c:simple-property.c:description: SQL statement to execute whenever a new connection is added to the pool.

c:simple-property.name: exception-sorter-class-name
c:simple-property.c:description: Java class to check if an exception should be broadcast.

c:simple-property.name: check-valid-connection-sql
c:simple-property.c:description: SQL to check the validity of a pool connection.

c:simple-property.name: track-statements
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether to check for unclosed statements when the connection is returned to the pool.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of 'Yes, but not warnings' will be used.
